name: PICO-8 Chaste Tris
description:
Porting Chaste Tris from C into Lua with PICO-8 was no easy task but I did it so that anyone can play the most retro nostalgic Tetris game the world has seen since the Gameboy days.

Theoretically the game should be playable through a web browser for anyone. But this game has no gravity. You can take all the time you need to place each block as you see fit.

You may also be interested in the original C version which comes with music and a replay feature.

https://chastitywhiterose.itch.io/chaste-tris
